contexts.context: ...to pray from childhood on and to recite every <mark>blessing</mark>, respond with Amen, His name is great...
...Amen, His name is great, holiness, <mark>blessings</mark> and the like.
...will be no other Torah from the Creator, <mark>blessed</mark> be His name. And with the Torah,...
...Meir of Rothenburg. May his memory be a <mark>blessing</mark>. (A historical retelling). I
The Holy One, <mark>Blessed</mark> is He, does not exact retribution from a nation...
